definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Bathroom shows the ingenuity of the designer, with separate bath and shower to meet different needs.
sentences.chinese: 客房內精心設計的浴室還擁有獨立的衝淋和盆浴區域。

sentences.english: But no, we want a hot tub too.
sentences.chinese: 錯了，我們還想要熱水盆浴。

sentences.english: I like to take baths instead of showers because I like sitting in water.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡盆浴勝過於淋浴，因爲我喜歡泡在水裏。

sentences.english: Do you prefer bath or shower?
Take short showers lasting about four or six minutes instead of a bath.
sentences.chinese: 洗澡時衝四到六分鐘的澡不再用盆浴。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
(of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
to rub oneself down with a wet towel/to take a sponge bath
to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
